properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 30 at 5:49PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
Observations show that seas have built to around 5 feet across the
coastal waters south of Cape Henry. In addition, a few wind gusts
to 25 knots are possible over the next few hours. Winds will
gradually diminish later this evening, but occasional 5 foot seas
may persist through the first part of tonight.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should consider avoiding navigating this evening.

NWSheadline: GUSTY WINDS AND 5 FOOT SEAS SOUTH OF CAPE HENRY THIS EVENING
